short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension make you easy to Scroll to Github page Top.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension makes you easy to scroll to the top of page.
The button shows while you scroll enough from top. :)

This just for GitHub, if you want this works on other site please let me know.
I will add the site url for you !

Support (and source code) can be found at GitHub: https://github.com/oiahoon/scroll-to-github-top
Follow me on weibo: https://weibo.com/desiver
